metadata.title: CVE-2024-21170 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/Python).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.4.0 andprior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorizedupdate, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Connectors accessible dataas well as  unauthorized read access to a subset of MySQL Connectorsaccessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial ofservice (partial DOS) of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.3(Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
